< p > An attorney for President Donald Trump 's longtime personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , accused [ARG0: porn star Stormy Daniels ' lawyer] in federal court on Wednesday of [V: leaking] [ARG1: Cohen 's bank records] , calling it a " drive - by shooting of my client 's rights."</p >

< p > An attorney for President Donald Trump 's longtime personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , accused [ARG0: porn star Stormy Daniels ' lawyer] in federal court on Wednesday of leaking Cohen 's bank records , [V: calling] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: a " drive - by shooting of my client 's rights."</p] >

< p > An attorney for President Donald Trump 's longtime personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , accused porn star Stormy Daniels ' lawyer in federal court on Wednesday of leaking Cohen 's bank records , calling it a " [V: drive] - by shooting of my client 's rights."</p >
